title: "BMW to use AI robots in automotive factories powered by Nvidia"
excerpt: "The system will be deployed to BMW factories worldwide. The robots will be based on Nvidia's end-to-end systems, with training and testing of the robots conducted using one software architecture running on the Nvidia open Isaac robotics platform."
